title: Navigate forwards to a meter in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the meter.

title: Navigate backwards to a meter in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the meter.

title: Request information about a meter in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the meter, read information about the meter

title: Trigger a meter update in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Change Value' button, activate the button to trigger a meter update.
